event.title: Wish Your Steak on Our Wish Grill.
event.description:
At AB's it is our continuous endeavour  to break the Monotony of our offerings. With many loyal guests visiting AB's, One thing that always keeps us on our toes is  how to ensure the boredom is taken off  in a set menu.
 
Reason is why we as a team we do not  believe in  limiting ourselves on our culinary thoughts , rather expand it as much as we can. This Event is aimed towards trying something which we have not tried till now & get some Variety on board for the Guests to enjoy the true blue  AB's experience by Chef Rajesh & His able team.
event.disclaimer: Restaurants are solely responsible for the service; availability and quality of the events including all or any cancellations/ modifications/ complaints.
